title: Man arrested on suspicion of murder after three people found dead at Essex property
text:
A man been arrested on suspicion of murder after three people were found dead at a property in Essex early this morning.

Police attended the address on Wellesley Road in Colchester at 10.15pm last night after reports of an altercation.

Officers found two men dead inside the property and the body of a third man in a car outside.

A 32-year-old from Colchester has been arrested. The road remains closed as enquiries continue.

Detectives are not currently looking for anyone else in connection with the incident but say they are "keeping an open mind".

They want to speak to anyone who might have seen any suspicious or unusual behaviour in the area between 6pm on Saturday 5 October and 1am on Sunday 6 October.

Anyone with information is asked to contact the Major Crime Team on 101 quoting incident 1400 of 5 October or call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111.
description: A man been arrested on suspicion of murder after three people were found dead at a property in Essex early this morning.
